item.title: Regression Metrics

Metrics: Mean Squared Error - MSE Root Mean Squared Error - RMSE Mean Absolute Error - MAE R squared - RÂ² MSE: Mean Squared Error It is the average between the differece of prediction and real data, squared. It is a loss function, so to optimize we will try to minimize it.
